#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;int z[10000001];
int num[1000001];
int main()
{
int n,d;
string s;
scanf("%d",&n);
cin>>s;
scanf("%d",&d);//cout<<d;
int l=s.length();//cout<<l;
z[0]=l;//cout<<z[0];
int L = 0, R = 0;
for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
  if (i > R) {
    L = R = i;
    while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
    z[i] = R-L; R--;
  } else {
    int k = i-L;
    if (z[k] < R-i+1) z[i] = z[k];
    else {
      L = i;
      while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
      z[i] = R-L; R--;
    }
  }
}
int ans=0;
for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
num[z[i]]=num[z[i]]+1;
for(int i=l;i>1;i--)
{num[i-1]=num[i-1]+num[i];}
for(int i=l;i>=1;i--)
{if(num[i]>=d){ans = i;break;}}printf("%d\n",ans);
cout<<s.substr(0,ans);
return 0;
}
